DOC.brief_title: Radioaerossol Pulmonary Deposition Using Mesh Normal Subjects
DOC.criteria: No history lung disease ; Forced vital capacity ( FVC ) force expiratory volume first second ( FEV1 ) high equal 80 % predict value ( Pereira et al. , 1992 ) , No history smoking ; Without respiratory cardiovascular disease ; Ability understand verbal command ; Willing provide sign consent participate study . Pregnant ; Were unable tolerate NIV ( Metha Hill , 2001 ) .
